About Bangladesh Country Profile
 officially the People's Republic of Bangladesh, is a country in South Asia.
 It is the eighth-most populous country in the world, with a population exceeding 163 million
 people, in an area of 148,560 square kilometres (57,360 sq mi), making it one of the most
 densely populated countries in the world.

The Muslim-majority state of Pakistan was born out of the partition of the
 Indian sub-continent in 1947, and has faced both domestic political upheavals and regional confrontations.
 Created to meet the demands of Indian Muslims for their own homeland, Pakistan was originally made up of two parts.
